article.Heading: Pick Asian Paints, Britannia; like YES Bank, HDFC Bank: Emkay
article.Summary: Dhananjay Sinha - Head, Institutional Research at Emkay Global Financial Services is of the view that one can pick Asian Paints, Britannia Industries and Marico and likes YES Bank, HDFC Bank and HCL Technologies.
article.Body:
Dhananjay Sinha - Head, Institutional Research at Emkay Global Financial Services told CNBC-TV18, "I am overweight on consumer space, so, I think that urban consumer will do well. We will have to see what the government does with respect to rural allocations. I am expecting expansionary Budget especially in the context that you will have state election. So, I think there will be certain allocation for rural sector as well. So, in consumer space, the picks that we have are Asian Paints, Britannia Industries and Marico."

"In the banking space, we still sort of like the consumer banks such as YES Bank, HDFC Bank and maybe IndusInd Bank. In autos we have been overweight and over there we see value in Tata Motors. Maybe two wheelers also can be considered like Hero Motocorp and Bajaj Auto," he said.

"Generally, we have been overweight in the IT space. We like HCL Technologies and in pharmaceutical space we have Lupin and Sun Pharmaceutical Industries."
